description: Detects suspicious calls of DLLs in rundll32.dll exports by ordinal Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: False positives depend on scripts and administrative tools used in the monitored environment
Windows control panel elements have been identified as source (mmc)
name: Suspicious Call by Ordinal
query: ((process.executable:*\\rundll32.exe AND process.command_line:(*,#* OR *,\ #* OR *.dll\ #*)) AND (NOT (process.command_line:*EDGEHTML.dll* AND process.command_line:*#141*)))
